description: Informatics Professional and Consulting Services, Systems Management, Project Management, EDP Management Consulting
extraDescription: The Department of National Defence requires the services of two System Auditors level 2 to provide software support in relation to the acquisition/in-service support of the Maritime Helicopter Project (MHP).
comments: This item was not reported previously. This contract was competitively sourced. This contract is a call-up against a Public Services and Procurement Canada procurement tool.
